ingredients.content: ½ oz fresh tarragon, leaves and tender stems

preparations.content: Place water into mixing bowl and place Varoma into position.

Place trimmed artichokes upside down into Varoma, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>30-35 min/Varoma/speed 2<b> until cooked through. Remove Varoma, invert Varoma lid and place under Varoma to catch drips and allow artichokes to cool slightly. Discard water and dry mixing bowl.
Place tarragon, garlic, salt and pepper into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add butter and lemon juice and heat <b>3 min/195/speed 1<b>. Serve immediately with warm artichokes.
